title: Column icons missing when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not show up as expected.
OB: Column icons are not displayed when connecting to a Derby database.
EB: Column icons should be displayed when connecting to a Derby database.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Navigate to the database table that contains columns.
4. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
